abstract: Nine stories (one in two versions) by Victorian war veterans.
description: Nine Victorian war veterans tell of their service during various wars for Australia. Covering World War II and the Vietnam War, these men share their experiences, joys and traumas of this time that would shape the rest of their lives. Created as part of 'In our words : stories from Victorian veterans' Digital Storytelling project at ACMI.
